page.text: Your eye was caught by a lovely, rather voluptuous tiger girl sitting down at the bar, taking a sip from a rather large drink. You thought about approaching her, but you didn't really know what you would say to this complete stranger without her being an employee here. You were just about to walk away when you heard her voice behind you. “Hey there, cute thing~” she said, causing you to whirl around almost immediately at the unexpected compliment. “Yeah, you! Come over here and tell me your name, sweet stuff.” the flattery she was piling on caught you off-guard, but you were at least enjoying it, so you thought you would humor her advancements at the very least! You grabbed a seat at the stool next to her, taking in the thick, but pleasant perfume she was wearing to accent her short skirt.

“Not much. I sort of hop from place to place. This Freehaven place is pretty nice; although it's a bit small for my liking. Probably going to hitch a ride on the next ship out of here, hanging out in this bar all day gets boring.”

“Eh, It's Hit or Miss. I've had quite the adventures, but I'm also spent a lot of time sitting around doing nothing... Kind of like this. She responded, taking another sip as she looked at you. “I do have to say though, you're one of the cuter things I've seen on my travels.”

It also revealed that she had quite the sizable cock hidden behind that skirt! The implication was clear.
